00023 #ifndef LUABIND_VALUE_WRAPPER_050419_HPP
00024 #define LUABIND_VALUE_WRAPPER_050419_HPP
00025 
00026 #include <boost/mpl/integral_c.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/mpl/bool.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/mpl/aux_/msvc_eti_base.hpp>
00029 
00030 #ifdef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00031 # define LUABIND_USE_VALUE_WRAPPER_TAG 
00032 #else
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 #ifdef LUABIND_USE_VALUE_WRAPPER_TAG
00036 # include <boost/mpl/identity.hpp>
00037 # include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00038 # include <boost/mpl/has_xxx.hpp>
00039 # include <boost/mpl/not.hpp>
00040 # include <boost/mpl/and.hpp>
00041 # include <boost/mpl/or.hpp>
00042 # include <boost/type_traits/is_reference.hpp>
00043 # include <boost/type_traits/is_pointer.hpp>
00044 # include <boost/type_traits/is_array.hpp>
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 namespace luabind {
00048 
00049 //
00050 // Concept ``ValueWrapper``
00051 //
00052 
00053 #ifdef LUABIND_USE_VALUE_WRAPPER_TAG
00054 template<class T>
00055 struct value_wrapper_traits;
00056     
00057 namespace detail 
00058 { 
00059 
00060   BOOST_MPL_HAS_XXX_TRAIT_DEF(value_wrapper_tag);
00061 
00062   struct unspecialized_value_wrapper_traits
00063   {
00064       typedef boost::mpl::false_ is_specialized;
00065   };
00066 
00067   template<class T>
00068   struct value_wrapper_traits_aux
00069   {
00070       typedef value_wrapper_traits<typename T::value_wrapper_tag> type;
00071   };
00072 
00073 } // namespace detail
00074 #endif
00075 
00076 template<class T>
00077 struct value_wrapper_traits
00078 #ifdef LUABIND_USE_VALUE_WRAPPER_TAG
00079   : boost::mpl::eval_if<
00080         boost::mpl::and_<
00081             boost::mpl::not_<
00082                 boost::mpl::or_<
00083                     boost::is_reference<T>
00084                   , boost::is_pointer<T>
00085                   , boost::is_array<T>
00086                 >
00087             >
00088           , detail::has_value_wrapper_tag<T>
00089         >
00090       , detail::value_wrapper_traits_aux<T>
00091       , boost::mpl::identity<detail::unspecialized_value_wrapper_traits>
00092     >::type
00093 {};
00094 #else
00095 {
00096     typedef boost::mpl::false_ is_specialized;
00097 };
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 template<class T>
00101 struct is_value_wrapper
00102   : boost::mpl::aux::msvc_eti_base<
00103         typename value_wrapper_traits<T>::is_specialized
00104     >::type
00105 {};
00106 
00107 } // namespace luabind
00108 
00109 #ifndef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00110 
00111 # include <boost/type_traits/remove_const.hpp>
00112 # include <boost/type_traits/remove_reference.hpp>
00113 
00114 namespace luabind {
00115 
00116 template<class T>
00117 struct is_value_wrapper_arg
00118   : is_value_wrapper<
00119       typename boost::remove_const<
00120           typename boost::remove_reference<T>::type
00121       >::type
00122     >
00123 {};
00124 
00125 } // namespace luabind
00126 
00127 #else
00128 
00129 # include <luabind/detail/yes_no.hpp>
00130 # include <boost/type_traits/add_reference.hpp>
00131 
00132 namespace luabind {
00133 
00134 namespace detail
00135 {
00136   template<class T>
00137   typename is_value_wrapper<T>::type is_value_wrapper_arg_check(T const*);
00138   
00139   yes_t to_yesno(boost::mpl::true_);
00140   no_t to_yesno(boost::mpl::false_);
00141 
00142   template<class T>
00143   struct is_value_wrapper_arg_aux
00144   {
00145       static typename boost::add_reference<T>::type x;
00146 
00147       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = 
00148           sizeof(to_yesno(is_value_wrapper_arg_check(&x)))
00149             == sizeof(yes_t)
00150       );
00151 
00152       typedef boost::mpl::bool_<value> type;
00153   };
00154 
00155 } // namespace detail
00156 
00157 template<class T>
00158 struct is_value_wrapper_arg
00159   : detail::is_value_wrapper_arg_aux<T>::type
00160 {
00161 };
00162 
00163 } // namespace luabind
00164 
00165 #endif
00166 
00167 #endif // LUABIND_VALUE_WRAPPER_050419_HPP
